description: Fulcro is a development framework that uses React and CLJS. This extension adds ability to track Fulcro DB, transactions and network
name: Fulcro Inspect

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; connect-src * data: blob: filesystem:; style-src 'self' data: chrome-extension-resource: 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: chrome-extension-resource:; frame-src 'self' data: chrome-extension-resource:; font-src 'self' data: chrome-extension-resource:; media-src * data: blob: filesystem:;
